title: Copy writing for DLT Entrepreneurs
description: Being able to communicate an idea and guide a reader to take the action you want them to is one of the most valuable skills in business.
solution: Create a free, open source, copywriting course for Catalyst participants and open a forum for them to post copy for critique and feedback.
experience: 8 years of communicating at an executive level in a corporate environment and 3 months of building in public as a solopreneur
